mapper.select: select fap_jobfair_seq , fap_jobfair_title , fap_jobfair_st , fap_jobfair_et from segroup.fap_jobfair_tb where fap_jobfair_eps = 'C1201' and fap_jobfair_st <= curdate() and fap_jobfair_et >= curdate() order by fap_jobfair_st asc;
select fap_jobfair_seq , fap_jobfair_title , fap_jobfair_st , fap_jobfair_et from segroup.fap_jobfair_tb where fap_jobfair_eps = 'C1201' and fap_jobfair_st > curdate() order by fap_jobfair_st asc;
select fap_jobfair_seq , fap_jobfair_title , fap_jobfair_st , fap_jobfair_et from segroup.fap_jobfair_tb where fap_jobfair_et < curdate() order by fap_jobfair_st asc;

select detail.fap_jobfair_divide_seq ,detail.fap_jobfair_seq ,detail.fap_jobfair_divide_st ,detail.fap_jobfair_divide_et ,detail.fap_jobfair_divide_detail ,detail.fap_jobfair_divide_gb ,detail.fap_jobfair_divide_gb_eps ,detail.fap_jobfair_divide_app_st ,detail.fap_jobfair_divide_app_et from fap_jobfair_divide_tb detail join fap_jobfair_tb job on job.fap_jobfair_seq = detail.fap_jobfair_seq join fap_jobfair_comp_tb comp on detail.fap_jobfair_divide_seq = comp.fap_jobfair_divide_seq where detail.fap_jobfair_seq = #{fap_jobfair_seq} and comp.fap_comp_id = #{fap_comp_id}

select fap_job_ad_seq ,fap_comp_id ,fap_job_ad_title ,fap_job_ad_state from fap_job_ad_tb where fap_comp_id = #{fap_comp_id} and fap_jobfair_divide_seq = #{fap_jobfair_divide_seq} and fap_job_ad_state in ('C2101','C2102')

select re.fap_job_recruit_pcs_seq ,re.fap_job_ad_seq ,re.fap_job_recruit_pcs_gb ,re.fap_job_recruit_pcs_dtl ,re.fap_job_recruit_pcs_od ,re.fap_job_recruit_pcs_ins_id ,re.fap_job_recruit_pcs_ins_dt ,re.fap_job_recruit_pcs_udt_id ,re.fap_job_recruit_pcs_udt_dt from fap_job_recruit_pcs_tb re join fap_job_ad_tb ad on ad.fap_job_ad_seq = re.fap_job_ad_seq where ad.fap_jobfair_divide_seq = #{fap_jobfair_divide_seq} and (select con.fap_comp_id from fap_comp_user_connect_tb con where user_id = #{user_id}) = ad.fap_comp_id order by re.fap_job_recruit_pcs_od asc

select user.user_id ,con.fap_comp_user_connect_ck ,comp.fap_comp_id
from com_user_tb user left join fap_comp_user_connect_tb con on user.user_id = con.user_id left join fap_company_user_tb comp on con.fap_comp_id = comp.fap_comp_id where user.user_id = #{user_id}

select fap_jobfair_comp_seq , fap_jobfair_divide_seq , fap_jobfair_seq , fap_comp_id , fap_jobfair_comp_gu from fap_jobfair_comp_tb where fap_jobfair_divide_seq = #{fap_jobfair_divide_seq} and fap_comp_id = #{fap_comp_id}
select fap_job_ad_seq , fap_comp_id , fap_job_ad_per from fap_job_ad_tb where fap_comp_id = #{fap_comp_id} and fap_jobfair_divide_seq = #{fap_jobfair_divide_seq}

select sch.fap_job_recruit_pcs_sch_seq , sch.fap_job_recruit_pcs_seq , sch.fap_job_recruit_pcs_sch_st , sch.fap_job_recruit_pcs_sch_et , sch.fap_job_recruit_pcs_sch_lo , sch.fap_job_recruit_pcs_sch_waitroom , sch.fap_job_recruit_pcs_sch_detail , sch.fap_job_recruit_pcs_sch_color , sch.fap_job_recruit_pcs_sch_ins_id , sch.fap_job_recruit_pcs_sch_ins_dt , sch.fap_job_recruit_pcs_sch_udt_id , sch.fap_job_recruit_pcs_sch_udt_dt , if(sch.fap_job_recruit_pcs_sch_st <= current_timestamp(), 0, 1) is_start , if(sch.fap_job_recruit_pcs_sch_et <= current_timestamp(), 0, 1) is_end from fap_job_recruit_pcs_sch_tb sch join fap_job_recruit_pcs_tb rec on sch.fap_job_recruit_pcs_seq = rec.fap_job_recruit_pcs_seq where rec.fap_job_ad_seq = #{fap_job_ad_seq} order by rec.fap_job_recruit_pcs_od asc
